alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northeastern Aitkin, southwestern St. Louis and Carlton Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Keewatin, to Tamarack, moving east at 45 mph. A 58 mph wind gust was reported near Hibbing around 6 PM CDT. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chisholm around 625 PM CDT. Buhl, Cherry and Cromwell around 635 PM CDT. Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area around 640 PM CDT. Virginia, Eveleth, Gilbert and Mahtowa around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Kinney, Swan Lake, Fish Lake, Silica, Little Swan, Jay Cooke State Park, Leonidas, Esko and Flowage Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca
